IAM Contrib Admin

Table of Contents

  • Admin Blocks

  • Mixins

Admin Blocks

class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.BaseHasAuthorAdminMixin
class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.BaseHasOwnerAdminMixin
class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.HasAuthorAdminBlock

Admin block for models with an author linked to a profile

class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.HasAuthorAdminMixin
class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.HasOwnerAdminBlock

Admin block for models with an owner linked to a profile

class iam.contrib.admin.blocks.HasOwnerAdminMixin

Mixins

class iam.contrib.admin.mixins.AutoOwnerAdminMixin

Admin mixin that autofills an owner field (denoted by owner_field, default owner) with the appropriate profile of the user who is logged in.

class iam.contrib.admin.mixins.FieldsetPermissionsMixin

Allow attaching permissions certain fieldsets, so we can hide them for users without access.
